name: mahjong-player
description: HTML5 + JavaScript で動作する麻雀アプリ「電脳麻将」

scripts.dev: npm run build:html-dev && npm run build:css && npm run build:js-dev
scripts.release: npm run build:html-prod && npm run build:css && npm run build:js-prod
scripts.server:dev: npm run clean && npm run dev && majiang-server -p 8080 -c /netplay.html -d ./dist -S
scripts.server:release: npm run clean && npm run release && majiang-server -p 8080 -c /netplay.html -d ./dist -S
scripts.bot: echo Run "majiang-bot -n '麻雀ロボ' -v -r <Room Number> <Site Url>/server"

author: Satoshi Kobayashi (https://github.com/kobalab)
